SELECT caseUniqueId as CASE_ID, entrezGeneId as ENTREZ_GENE_ID, hugoGeneSymbol as HUGO_GENE_SYMBOL, NULL as DUMMY_COLUMN FROM (SELECT gene.ENTREZ_GENE_ID AS entrezGeneId, gene.HUGO_GENE_SYMBOL AS hugoGeneSymbol, as caseUniqueId, as caseStableId, genetic_profile.STABLE_ID as geneticProfileId
FROM structural_variant INNER JOIN genetic_profile ON structural_variant.GENETIC_PROFILE_ID = genetic_profile.GENETIC_PROFILE_ID INNER JOIN sample ON structural_variant.SAMPLE_ID = sample.INTERNAL_ID INNER JOIN patient ON sample.PATIENT_ID = patient.INTERNAL_ID INNER JOIN gene ON structural_variant.SITE1_ENTREZ_GENE_ID = gene.ENTREZ_GENE_ID UNION ALL SELECT gene.ENTREZ_GENE_ID AS entrezGeneId, gene.HUGO_GENE_SYMBOL AS hugoGeneSymbol, as caseUniqueId, as caseStableId, genetic_profile.STABLE_ID as geneticProfileId FROM structural_variant INNER JOIN genetic_profile ON structural_variant.GENETIC_PROFILE_ID = genetic_profile.GENETIC_PROFILE_ID INNER JOIN sample ON structural_variant.SAMPLE_ID = sample.INTERNAL_ID INNER JOIN patient ON sample.PATIENT_ID = patient.INTERNAL_ID INNER JOIN gene ON structural_variant.SITE2_ENTREZ_GENE_ID = gene.ENTREZ_GENE_ID) as combinedResults
